div.head: Test for an app with different wit attributes
div.p: etena yad uktaṃ kaṇikāyāṃ yadi kulālādīnāṃ katipayopakaraṇādijñānam, na samastopakaraṇādijñatā, tarhi tenaiva nidarśanena īśvarasyāpi tadupakaraṇādimātrajñānam | tanmātrajñāne na sarvajñatāsiddhiḥ | tadupakaraṇādimātrajñānam | tanmātrajñāne na sarvajñatāsiddhiḥ tadupakaraṇādimātrajñāne na sarvajñatāsiddhiḥ katipayajño hi tathā sati syāt |
